title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Exploring Microbial Structures Using Virtual Reality: A Program for Secondary Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe the spatial arrangement of cellular organelles by exploring the 3D structures of microorganisms in a VR environment.
Learners can express microbial proliferation patterns through mathematical modeling using virtual reality simulation data.
Learners can write reports explaining the interconnectedness of microbiology and mathematical analysis skills through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
